src_original: bhagavān āha /  tat kiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣuḥ āhaivam etad bhagavan saṃvidyate tathāgatasya

1. divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣuḥ //  bhagavān āha /  tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantyo gaṃgānadyāṃ vālukās tāvantya gaṃgānadyo bhaveyus tāsu yā vālukās tāvanta eva lokadhātavo  2. bhaveyuḥ kaccid bahavas te lokadhātavo bhaveyuḥ bhagavān āha /

tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ya imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyād api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā  5. vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveta /  āha /  bahu bhagavan bahu sugata /  bhagavān āha /  evam etat subhūte evam etad bahu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ  6. bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveta /  sacet subhūte puṇyaskandho 'bhaviṣyan na tathāgato 'bhāṣiṣyat puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti /
tat kiṃ manyase subhūte rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ
